meaningMnemonic: Lift the <radical>lid</radical> off your <radical>preserve</radical>s, <radical>kick</radical> it, and <kanji>praise</kanji> the lord! Your food is preserved, you don't need the lid anymore, praise be!
readingMnemonic: You do this <kanji>prais</kanji>ing in your <reading>ho</reading>me (ほう), though, not a church. I don't think anyone outside your home would understand why you're praising inanimate objects.
